name: Employee Advance Bulk Statistics
query: SELECT 'Employee Advances' as label, COUNT(*) as value FROM `tabEmployee Advance` WHERE docstatus = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 'Payment Entries' as label, COUNT(*) as value FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE is_advance = 1 AND docstatus = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 'Bulk Documents' as label, COUNT(*) as value FROM `tabEmployee Advance Bulk` WHERE docstatus = 1
